text: <http://radians-4713655.hs-sites.com/hs-search-results?term=KWG515ACXXS> seems like it doesn't want to index the hidden content on the page

So it might pick it up once the site is live and we can allow crawlers? :thinking_face:
If the pages are hidden from search engines then we assume it should be hidden from site search as well as we donâ€™t want to expose those hidden pages to outside sources through the search API
